supplier_of: agriculture - import-export | organic products | productos ecológicos
information: We are a Spanish company based in Valencia, specialised in the production of organic products such as extra virgin olive oil, almonds and essences. We supply high-standing hotels, specialised shops, herbalist shops, gourmet restaurants, etc. with our top-quality and healthy natural products. Our ecological extra virgin olive oil comes from the ecological cultivation of olives. The European Union research program has made possible its cultivation, free from fertilizers, chemical pesticides, additives or preservatives. All of this is done under the supervision of the Committee of Ecological Agriculture (C.A.A.E.).
keywords: Agriculture - import-export, organic products, productos ecológicos
